word:
Christ declared, I have pledged Myself, as the only begotten Son of the Lord God Almighty, to carry out God's plan to win souls from Satan to the Lord's side. Christ alone can defeat the enemy. He works in man's behalf to uncover his plans, that souls may be led to turn from the arch-deceiver. 


                                  (Signed) 

(From Doctor Paulson's Collection)              Ellen G. White 


                                                                93.
